headline: The Erasmus Experience
text: In this timeline, you will get to learn about programme that was developed to support European student movility with the increasingly unified European system of higher education and why this experience is a once in a lifetime opportunity.

headline: Erasmus of Rotterdam
text:
Born in the danish city of Rotterdam, Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus was a Dutch philosopher and catholic theologian. At his time he was already considered one of the greatest scholars of the northern Renaissance. As a Catholic priest, he was an important figure in classical scholarship who wrote in a pure Latin style.

The European Community Network for Academic Exchanges is also called the Erasmus Programme in honor of the multinational and pro-European character of the humanist philosopher.

headline: What is Erasmus? Erasmus experience: the beginning of the program
Countries that take part in the program
Advantages of Erasmus
text: In this post we will talk about some advantages, disadvantages and culture shocks you might experience when going on exchange. We will share tips, tricks and some of our own experiences. You will need adaptation, and we are here to help you do that.
